desc.title: Description
desc.description: Description offering more details about when the key should be used.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description:
Meta defines any additional details that may be useful or associated
with the key.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: Where the information was sourced from and where it can be reviewed for updates in the future.

values.title: Values
values.description:
Values defines the possible values associated with the key, which themselves will
either be keys or codes depending on the context.

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description:
Pattern is used to validate the key value instead of using a fixed value
from the code or key definitions.

map.title: Code Map
map.description:
Map helps map local keys to specific codes, useful for converting the
described key into a local code.

Definition.description: Definition defines properties of a key, code, or other value that has a specific meaning or utility.
